title: Authority vs Democracy
author: VD
content_html:
One could add minor cities like Portland and Minneapolis to the image, but that would be overkill. The point is that history has not ended and liberal democracy is no longer winning. Democracy is neither virtuous nor eusocietal. It is abundantly clear that it is dyscivilizational. There is a reason the Founding Fathers created a system to expressly limit democracy by limiting the voting franchise to mature white land-owning men, and the Western democracies are presently experiencing the consequences of foolishly expanding the franchise.

Russia is not only going to defeat the Kiev regime, it is going to defeat NATO and Clown World. How long it will take is impossible to say, but the demise of Clown World is inevitable due to its many incoherencies.
